ing: 1 (15 ounce) can sliced beets, drained and cut into bite-size pieces
1 (15 ounce) can hearts of palm, drained and cut into bite-size pieces
1/4 cup sour cream, or more to taste
des: "A fresh, creamy salad with a surprising texture and lovely color."
ins: Combine the beets, hearts of palm, sour cream, garlic, onion flakes, adobo seasoning, and chile paste in a bowl; toss to mix well. Serve immediately or chill.
